actions.text: Mr. Bishop raised a point of order against the Torres amendment (A004). Mr. Bishop stated that the amendment is a limitation amendment and it is not in order until the last four lines of the bill have been read. The Chair sustained the point of order.

purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any funding to be used for programs at the United States Army School of the Americas located at Fort Benning, Georgia.
